Detailed Description

Base class for scoring two (aligned) sites.

This class defines the interface required for a class to be able to be used to score two sites. A derived class can be used at either level of the scoring (template parameter 1 or 2 of ScoreRigidAlignments)

notes on template parameters: align_T: must be rigid_align_t or derived class

Member Function Documentation

const bool ASCbase::SitesScoreBase::scale_terms (  )  const [inline]

Should each term be linearly scaled to from [0.0, max] to [0.0, 1.0] where max is the maximum value the query site can have for that term?

virtual const bool ASCbase::SitesScoreBase::score_is_noop (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Is the function score a no op?

It is safe to return false here since, this class is a pure virtual class

virtual bool ASCbase::SitesScoreBase::uses_hbond_surfaces (  )  [inline, virtual]

Derived class should return false, unless the derived class is using the hydrogen bond surface caps

Reimplemented in ASCbase::CopyTier1Score< tier1_SF >, ASCbase::ModelSiteRMSD, ASCbase::NoTier1Score, ASCbase::point_and_surf_score, and ASCbase::WeightedSumsScore.

virtual bool ASCbase::SitesScoreBase::uses_surface_mesh (  )  [inline, virtual]

Derived class should return false, unless, the site's surface needs to be to be rotated and translated

Reimplemented in ASCbase::CopyTier1Score< tier1_SF >, ASCbase::ModelSiteRMSD, ASCbase::NoTier1Score, ASCbase::point_and_surf_score, and ASCbase::WeightedSumsScore.
